description: Data breach risk requires encryption security measure
Unauthorized access risk requires multi-factor authentication measure
Privilege escalation risk requires role-based access control measure
Exploitation risk requires patch management security measure
Facility breach risk requires physical security measures
Human error risk requires staff training security measure
Uncontrolled incident risk requires incident response procedures
Data loss risk requires backup and recovery measure
Interception risk requires transmission encryption measure
Undetected breach risk requires audit logging measure
Misconfiguration risk requires change management measure
Malware infection risk requires malware protection measure
